item.title: Trump DOJ: The FBI Is Withholding ‘Thousands Of Pages’ Of Epstein Files
item.description: The FBI is withholding 'thousands of pages of documents' related to sex trafficker Jeffrey Epstein, according to AG Pam Bondi.

item.title: Exclusive: Watchdog Group Files Complaint Against Judge For Demanding Gender Quotas Among Litigators
item.description: The Article III Project filed a complaint of misconduct against a judge in Florida for demanding sex be criteria for legal representation.

item.title: Propaganda Press Upset Trump Could Shut Down CISA’s Election Censorship
item.description: The Trump administration has launched a review of every Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Agency (CISA) role related to election security and so-called...

item.title: Trump’s Pick To Lead The Navy Signals Commitment To Rebuilding America’s Depleted Maritime Fleet
item.description: Rebuilding America's naval fleet will be a priority for the Trump admin, Navy Secretary nominee John Phelan told lawmakers on Thursday.

item.title: Even After LA Mayor Terminated Top Fire Lesbian, City Still Places DEI Above Competence
item.description: The Federalist obtained whistleblower training for LAFD EMTs that says to use 'preferred pronouns' and 'inclusive terms.'
